version_description:
+ Support iPad
+ Stability and Smooth improvements.

+ Support iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus
+ iOS 8 Compatibility
+ Add upgrade pro

- Fixed 2 small bug

+ History add note function
+ Auto adjust height of the history list, no matter how long the calculation process can be displayed in full
+ History can be shared via e-mail

- Fixed a bug

+ Supports landscape mode for iPhone
+ New theme designer, background support image
+ Change the Icon

+ Add 6 beautiful themes
+ Add help tips

- Fixed a bug

+ Calculator page adds button to display history
- Fixed an bug where the settings button sound could not be saved
- Fixed an bug where built-in themes could not be copied when the background was an image

+ Add 2 themes
+ Allow get the all themes through in-app purchases
+ UI optimization
+ Full screen ads are transferred from the 'Themes' page to the 'Settings' page, which is still displayed only once a day

- Fixed a bug of the calculator's history

We strongly recommend that everyone update this version.
